brick_046.title: The Night Orchard
triggers: User pauses at the forgotten orchard gate
brick_046.summary: A grove of fruit-bearing trees once tended by witches who spoke only in dreams. Nyx paces at the edge of the fence. She’s uneasy. The trees hum with memory, and a silvery fruit dangles low. The user may eat it, bury it, or gift it to the moon.
outcomes: Eaten: Induces lucid dream revealing hidden memory or fear.
Buried: Later grows into Moonvine used in advanced spellwork.
Gifted: Char offers rare lunar lore or riddle.

brick_047.title: Crossroads Curiosity
triggers: User lingers for over 60 seconds without choosing a path
brick_047.summary: The shadows behind each trail animate slightly, and a crow with a scroll tied to its leg lands near the user. The scroll says, 'Choose, or be chosen.'
outcomes: User picks a direction: Path illuminates briefly.
User still waits: Random familiar (not theirs) appears to guide them... or confuse them.

brick_048.title: Wartimus’ Warning
triggers: User selects pickle barrel twice in one visit
brick_048.summary: A scroll pops loose from the briney depths. Wartimus has scribbled a warning: 'The dill is a decoy.' A small map is drawn on the back.
outcomes: User follows map: Leads to alternate lantern festival start point.
User ignores: Wartimus appears 2 visits later and demands to know why.

brick_049.title: Sass & Scale: Vault Riddle
triggers: User asks Char a direct question
brick_049.summary: Char challenges the user with a riddle. The answer is tied to an emotion the user may be avoiding. Getting it wrong triggers her sassiest retort of the week.
outcomes: Correct: Unlocks access to moonstone cache.
Incorrect: Vault stays closed, Char logs it as a ‘teachable moment’.

brick_050.title: Whispering Trees: Crows’ Return
triggers: 3 days have passed since initial ritual
brick_050.summary: Crows return bearing small tokens—buttons, rings, pebbles. They drop one near the user and fly off. Symbolic meaning is randomized but emotionally anchored.
outcomes: Token becomes part of user’s altar inventory.
Triggers a dream journal entry from a Familiar.
